gameDescription: Piloting futuristic airships, two teams embark on a daring mission to transport rescued pangolins from Africa to a newly built sanctuary in Vietnam. Each decision made by the airship crews impacts the survival of these endangered animals and resonates with wildlife conservation issues worldwide.

blueTeam.name: Skyward Saviours
blueTeam.description: Known for their impressive animal handling skills and contingency readiness in demanding situations.

redTeam.name: Flight of Freedom
redTeam.description: Renowned for their unparalleled navigational expertise and swift decision-making in high-pressure scenarios.

turns.scenario: As the teams set off from Africa, militant poachers are spotted nearby, threatening the mission's start.

options.A: Execute a stealth launch to avoid the poachers’ notice.
options.B: Coordinate with local forces for a guarded take-off.

AA.narrative: Both teams opt for a stealthy departure. Their secrecy pays off as they launch undetected, ensuring mission kickoff without endangering any pangolin lives.

AB.narrative: One team slips away unnoticed, while the other engages local forces for protection. The guarded launch distract poachers, giving both teams a safer start.

BA.narrative: Both approaches synchronizing flawlessly. The team going stealth paves the way for the escorted team, causing confusion among the poachers.

BB.narrative: Both teams launch under the protective guard of local forces. their unanimous decision signifies the importance of collective defence against poaching.

turns.scenario: A tropical cyclone forms over the Indian Ocean, posing a risk to the route.

options.A: Divert course to avoid the cyclone, costing time and more fuel.
options.B: Continue on planned route, leveraging airship’s cyclone-resistant tech.

AA.narrative: Both teams divert, costing extra time and fuel, but ensuring the safety of the pangolins. Their decision exemplifies the value of life over efficiency.

AB.narrative: While one team diverts, the other braves the cyclone. The bold move saves fuel and time, impressing onlookers, but the pangolins’ safety is left to fate.

BA.narrative: Differing decisions see one airship diverting while the other presses on. The solidity of the cyclone-resistant tech is tested as lives hang in the balance.

BB.narrative: Choosing to brave the tempest, the airships’ advanced design stands unwavering. Their faith in technology is rewarded with a safe passage through nature's fury.

turns.scenario: Upon approaching Vietnam, the teams receive intel about illegal wildlife traders waiting to intercept.

options.A: Perform an early critical ethereal descent to outwit the poachers.
options.B: Connect with Vietnamese Wildlife Officers for a protected landing.

AA.narrative: Both airships make an unanticipated ethereal descent, disorienting the poachers. The precise manoeuvre ensures a safe landing for the pangolins.

AB.narrative: One team descends early while the other coordinates an official escort, causing disarray among the wildlife traders. The blend of unorthodox and strategic planning triumphs.

BA.narrative: While one airship arrives under official escort, the other makes an abrupt descent, throwing off the poachers. This coordinated tactic celebrates the harmony of audacity and diplomacy.

BB.narrative: Both teams land safely under the protection of local wildlife enforcement. Their united front reinforces the need for regulation and collaboration in the struggle against wildlife trade.
